name: Basic Mario
description:
this game was made in 2 days using VB.net

THE STORY

  • I travelled to a different dimension 
  • seems that I reach the dystopian Mario universe
  • it's just an endless tunnel  with the void under me and fire behind me
  • the platform I'm on is moving to the fire, but I can platform to the other platforms Infront of me
  • I need to be careful though, there are zombies and turrets

NOTE

  • you must have .NET FRAMEWORK 6.0 to play
    install from here
    https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet
